thread.title: Michael, CUMBERNAULD
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Michael, CUMBERNAULD

author: Michael, CUMBERNAULD
title: Michael, CUMBERNAULD
text: I wanted a Barbour watch which was on Amazon for £105. I was able to purchase it from Country Attire for £60 and pay via my Amazon account. Great option and it was delivered in two working days. Superb.
